Literature.Title: Non-perfectly Amphipathic α-Helical Structure Containing the XXYXX Sequence Improves the Biological Activity of Bovine αs2-Casein Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: Gu L, Sun C, Chen L, Pang S, Hussain MA, Jiang C, Ma J, Jiang Z, Hou J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=128 µM,Human endothelial hybrid cells Ea.hy 926:18.39% Killing=256 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi CMCC 50071(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica CMCC 47020(MIC=128µM),Cronobacter sakazakii ATCC 29544(MIC=0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus CMCC 26074(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=2µM),Listeria monocytogenes CMCC 54004(MIC=4µM),Bacillus cereus CMCC 6303(MIC=64µM)
